itemDescription: Welsh noblewoman, called "Mam Cymru" ("Mother of Wales")

wikipedia_page.main: Katheryn of Berain (Welsh: Catrin o Ferain) (born 1535 - Latin eulogy; died aged 56 on 27 August 1591), sometimes called Mam Cymru ("mother of Wales"), was a Welsh noblewoman noted for her four marriages and her extensive network of descendants and relations.
